params.baseAPRBpsIn: The base Annual Percentage Rate for rewards, in basis points.
params.lpToken: The address of the LP token for the new pool.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.duration: The staking duration for this tier, in seconds.
params.earlyWithdrawalPenalty: The penalty for early unstaking, in basis points.
params.rewardMultiplier: The reward multiplier for this tier, in basis points.

returns.tierId: The ID of the newly created tier.

params.positionId: The ID of the staking position.

checkEmergencyStatus(bytes4).details: This function is typically called by modifiers within the implementing contract to guard functions.

params.operation: The 4-byte function selector of the operation being attempted.

returns.allowed: A boolean indicating if the operation is permitted.

params.positionId: The ID of the user's staking position.

returns.amountClaimed: The amount of reward tokens claimed.

constructor.details: Disables the regular constructor to make the contract upgradeable.

emergencyShutdown(uint8).details: The implementing contract defines how it should react to different emergency levels. For example, it might pause itself or enable emergency withdrawals.

params.emergencyLevel: The system-wide emergency level being broadcast by the controller.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the shutdown was handled successfully.

emergencyWithdrawLP(uint256).details: This function can only be called if emergency withdrawal is enabled by the owner. A fixed penalty is applied, and no rewards are paid.

params.positionId: The ID of the user's staking position to withdraw.

returns.amountWithdrawn: The amount of LP tokens returned to the user after the emergency penalty.

returns.enabled: True if emergency withdrawal is enabled.

params.positionId: The ID of the staking position.

returns.activeFlag: True if the position is active, false otherwise.
returns.endTime: The timestamp when the stake matures.
returns.lastClaimTime: The timestamp of the last reward claim.
returns.lpTokenOut: The address of the staked LP token.
returns.startTime: The timestamp when the stake was created.
returns.tierIdOut: The ID of the staking tier.

returns._0: The address of the LiquidityManager contract.

params.lpToken: The address of the LP token pool.

returns.baseAPRBpsOut: The base APR of the pool, in basis points.
returns.isActiveOut: True if the pool is active, false otherwise.
returns.totalStakedInPoolOut: The total amount of the LP token staked in this pool.

returns._0: The address of the reward token.

returns.activeOut: True if the tier is active, false otherwise.
returns.durationOut: The staking duration of the tier.
returns.earlyWithdrawalPenaltyOut: The early withdrawal penalty of the tier.
returns.rewardMultiplierOut: The reward multiplier of the tier.

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.details: Sets up the initial owner, staking parameters, and dependent contract addresses. Can only be called once.

params.accessControlAddr_: The address of the AccessControl contract.
params.emergencyControllerAddr_: The address of the EmergencyController contract.
params.initialOwner_: The address of the initial owner of the contract.
params.liquidityManagerAddr_: The address of the LiquidityManager contract.
params.minStakeDuration_: The minimum duration for any staking tier.
params.pREWATokenAddress_: The address of the pREWA reward token.

returns.isPaused: A boolean indicating if the contract is considered to be in a paused state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

recoverTokens(address,uint256).details: Cannot be used to recover the reward token or any actively staked LP tokens.

params.amountRec: The amount of the token to recover.
params.tokenAddressRec: The address of the token to recover.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

setEmergencyController(address).details: This function should be access-controlled within the implementing contract (e.g., `onlyOwner`).

params.controller: The address of the new EmergencyController.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.enabled: Whether to enable or disable emergency withdrawals.
params.penalty: The penalty to apply on emergency withdrawals, in basis points.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.amount: The amount of the LP token to stake.
params.lpToken: The address of the LP token to stake.
params.tierId: The ID of the staking tier to use.

returns.positionId: The ID of the newly created staking position for the user.

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

unstakeLPTokens(uint256).details: An early withdrawal penalty may be applied if the staking duration has not been completed.

params.positionId: The ID of the user's staking position to unstake.

returns.amountUnstaked: The amount of LP tokens returned to the user after any penalties.

params.active: The new active status for the pool.
params.lpToken: The address of the LP token for the pool to update.
params.newBaseAPRBpsIn: The new base APR for the pool, in basis points.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.active: The new active status for the tier.
params.duration: The new staking duration for the tier.
params.earlyWithdrawalPenalty: The new early withdrawal penalty for the tier.
params.rewardMultiplier: The new reward multiplier for the tier.
params.tierId: The ID of the tier to update.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

addPool(address,uint256).notice: Adds a new LP token pool for staking.

calculateLPRewards(address,uint256).notice: Calculates the pending rewards for a specific staking position.

checkEmergencyStatus(bytes4).notice: Checks if a specific operation is allowed based on the current emergency status.

claimLPRewards(uint256).notice: Claims pending rewards for a specific staking position without unstaking.

emergencyController().notice: The central controller for system-wide emergency states.

emergencyShutdown(uint8).notice: A function to be called by the EmergencyController to trigger a state change in the contract.

emergencyWithdrawLP(uint256).notice: Allows a user to withdraw their staked LP tokens during an emergency.

getEmergencyController().notice: Returns the address of the EmergencyController managing this contract.

getLPEmergencyWithdrawalSettings().notice: Gets the current emergency withdrawal settings.

getLPPositionCount(address).notice: Gets the total number of staking positions for a user.

getLPStakingPosition(address,uint256).notice: Retrieves the details of a specific LP staking position.

getLiquidityManagerAddress().notice: Returns the address of the LiquidityManager contract.

getPoolInfo(address).notice: Retrieves information about a specific LP token pool.

getRewardTokenAddress().notice: Returns the address of the reward token.

getTierInfo(uint256).notice: Retrieves information about a specific staking tier.

isEmergencyPaused().notice: Checks if the contract is effectively paused, either locally or by the global EmergencyController.

isLPToken(address).notice: A mapping to quickly check if a token address is a registered LP token.

recoverTokens(address,uint256).notice: Recovers ERC20 tokens mistakenly sent to this contract.

setEmergencyController(address).notice: Sets or updates the address of the EmergencyController.

stakeLPTokens(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Stakes a specified amount of an LP token into a chosen tier.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

unstakeLPTokens(uint256).notice: Unstakes a position, claims any pending rewards, and returns the principal LP tokens.

updatePool(address,uint256,bool).notice: Updates an existing LP token pool's parameters.

updateTier(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Updates an existing staking tier's parameters.
